reactor.core.observability

接口 SignalListenerFactory<T,STATE>

  • 类型参数:
    T - the type of data emitted by the observed source Publisher
    STATE - the type of the publisher-level state that will be shared between all SignalListener created by this factory

    public interface SignalListenerFactory<T,STATE>
    A factory for per-subscription SignalListener, exposing the ability to generate common state at publisher level from the source Publisher.

    Examples of such state include:

    • is the publisher a Mono? (unlocking Mono-specific behavior in the SignalListener
    • resolution of NAME and TAGS on the source
    • preparation of a common configuration, like a registry for metrics
    作者:
    Simon Baslé

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      SignalListener<T> createListener(org.reactivestreams.Publisher<? extends T> source, ContextView listenerContext, STATE publisherContext)
      Create a new SignalListener each time a new Subscriber subscribes to the source Publisher.
      STATE initializePublisherState(org.reactivestreams.Publisher<? extends T> source)
      Create the STATE object for the given Publisher.

    • 方法详细资料

      • initializePublisherState

        STATE initializePublisherState(org.reactivestreams.Publisher<? extends T> source)
        Create the STATE object for the given Publisher. This assumes this factory will only be used on that particular source, allowing all SignalListener created by this factory to inherit the common state.
        参数:
        source - the source Publisher this factory is attached to.
        返回:
        the common state

      • createListener

        SignalListener<T> createListener(org.reactivestreams.Publisher<? extends T> source,
                                 ContextView listenerContext,
                                 STATE publisherContext)
        Create a new SignalListener each time a new Subscriber subscribes to the source Publisher.

        The source Publisher is the same as the one that triggered common state creation at assembly time in initializePublisherState(Publisher)). Said common state is passed to this method as well, and so is the ContextView for the newly registered CoreSubscriber.

        参数:
        source - the source Publisher that is being subscribed to
        listenerContext - the ContextView associated with the new subscriber
        publisherContext - the common state initialized in initializePublisherState(Publisher)
        返回:
        a stateful SignalListener observing signals to and from the new subscriber
